# comfyui-hosting

Safely run ComfyUI as a LAN/internal service (and only intentionally as a public service). Covers bind/listen, TLS, reverse proxy, firewalling, Desktop-vs-server guidance, and security rules around custom nodes. Use when enabling LAN access, deploying to server/VPS/cloud, hardening, or configuring reverse proxy and TLS. Use only when the user explicitly mentions ComfyUI, ComfyUI workflows, cust...
